ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pjf.k | |- K = ( proj ` W ) |
| 2 |  | pjf.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ocv ` W ) = ( ocv ` W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( proj1 ` W ) = ( proj1 ` W ) |
| 6 | 2, 3, 4, 5, 1 | #P_pjdm | |- ( T e. dom K <-> ( T e. ( LSubSp ` W ) /\ ( T ( proj1 ` W ) ( ( ocv ` W ) ` T ) ) : V --> V ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_simprbi | |- ( T e. dom K -> ( T ( proj1 ` W ) ( ( ocv ` W ) ` T ) ) : V --> V ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 1 | #P_pjval | |- ( T e. dom K -> ( K ` T ) = ( T ( proj1 ` W ) ( ( ocv ` W ) ` T ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_feq1d | |- ( T e. dom K -> ( ( K ` T ) : V --> V <-> ( T ( proj1 ` W ) ( ( ocv ` W ) ` T ) ) : V --> V ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_mpbird | |- ( T e. dom K -> ( K ` T ) : V --> V ) |
